summaries.title: High-level architecture decisions (live)
summaries.summary: Monorepo with clear separation: frontend (TypeScript/Vite), backend (Python services and orchestrator), ai/ for models. All components under active development.

summaries.title: Merge strategy for external frontend template
summaries.summary: Staged merge using scripts/merge_and_cleanup.py. Preserve frontend templates into frontend/template_sources/<origin> for manual review. Dry-run first; only recommended top-level dirs are copied by default. Status: UNDER ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT.
